data.title: Team Marketing Report
data.meta_description: Newtown Square, Pa.-based SAP America is the U.S. unit of SAP SE, a global enterprise software, cloud, interface, application and business network company. Global operations are run from SAP SE global headquarters in Walldorf, Ger. Brief history of SAP SAP SE was founded in Weinheim, Ger., in 1972 by five co-founders: Dietmar Hopp, Hans-Werner Hector, Hasso Plattner, Klaus Tschira and Claus Wellenreuther. In 1971, when Xerox decided to stop manufacturingÂ computer hardware, it asked IBM to migrate its business systems to IBM . . .
